All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    Book
    Entity for books.
    BookCrudController
    This class contains endpoints for CRUD operations on Book entities.
    BookCrudService
    Handles CRUD operations of Book entity
    BookListEntry
    Meant to carry enough information to convey list of a user's books
    BookRepository  
    ErrorHandlerModel
    Simple model for handling errors manually.
    LibraryManagementSystemApplication  
    ListingController
    This class contains endpoints for listing out Books issued to a specific User, or Users who have been issued a specific Book.
    ListingService
    Handles Listing out users who have been issued a book, or Books which are issued to a user
    RestExceptionHandler
    This class contains custom error handlers for Response codes 400,404,500.
    Transaction
    Entity handles issuance and return of books.
    TransactionController
    This class contains endpoints for issuing Books to Users and for Users submitting Books.
    TransactionRepository  
    TransactionRequest
    Handles incoming transaction (book issue, book submit) requests.
    TransactionService
    Handles transactional operations (issue,submit) of Books and Users
    TrnxType
    Enum to signify what kind of transaction is taking place.
    User
    Entity for users.
    UserCrudController
    This class contains endpoints for CRUD operations on User entities.
    UserCrudService
    Handles CRUD operations of User entity
    UserListEntry
    Meant to carry enough information to convey list of a book's users
    UserRepository
